meanings.definition: A person who has not graduated from a particular institution or program.
meanings.sent1: The nongraduate was excited to attend the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The university had many nongraduate students in its halls.
meanings.sent3: The nongraduate accidentally walked into the faculty meeting instead of the student lounge.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nongraduate in the world of academia, still learning the ropes.
meanings.sent5: The nongraduate's determination to succeed was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To not graduate from a particular institution or program.
meanings.sent1: She decided to nongraduate and pursue a different career path.
meanings.sent2: Many students nongraduate due to various reasons.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to nongraduate from obedience school by hiding under the desk.
meanings.sent4: His dream of becoming a pilot seemed to nongraduate as he faced his fear of heights.
meanings.sent5: The decision to nongraduate was a tough one, but she knew it was the right choice for her.
